channel.title: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more
channel.description:
Hey everyone, WrathScapeV2 is a 317 rsps with many things to do on there and many things to be added. Please feel free to check us out and leave some comments on our forums of what you think, enjoy the game (: Thanks everyone www.wrathscape.info
- Dicing - Pm logs - Chat logs - Commands logs - Curse prayer - Players shop - Donator island - All Tzhaar waves - Bank slots - Money pouch - Multiple custom item - Clan chat + Lootshare - summoning system - Perfect skillcape emotes - Perfect combat + perfect PVP - Pk'ing skills *Much more*
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/25yy8t2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2uyrq8n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2zz54bl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/wqvq4n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/wt7fav.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2vcix38.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2i7res6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/nvv2bk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/jtrwjb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/10nhzj8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2ut3f9f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/35aqfzd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/op8v2o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/av3o5k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/htidjl.png[/img]

item.source: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more

item.title: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

I am with sk8rdude. I played for 4 hours. DO NOT PLAY THIS SERVER!

  1. constant roll backs (maybe 3 times an hour) There is a chance you will lose items and skills. I lost (50m, dh axe, dh helm, dragon chain, dragon helm, 2 whips, and dragon gauntles) I reported all of the cases to owner “Beale” and he will not help because it did not happen to everyone else.

  2. attack animations and death animations are horrible. Looks like you are fighting blobs and it is just hideous.

  3. eco is horrible. In V1 of Wrathscape you got a 15m starter. Now it is 50m. And alot of the monsters drop 1m cash each drop

  4. Pay2Win and Vote2Win, Beale spams all the time to donate 10, 15, 25$ for donating ranks. Or you can donate 10$ for your own private house… It is literally non stop and annoying. Why would we donator when you do not help players and you act like a jerk to everyone?

  5. Bugs, Tons of bugs you get stuck all of the time (especially in slayer tower).

  6. Bosses are to OP, Most of the bosses 1 hit you.

  7. It is exactly what Moparscape User “Tree” posted in his video review about it. All that is changed is a few areas are different and home and stuff. But all the negatives are still the same and have not been fixed or edited. Only have gotten worse. (Especially the 50m starter and 1m constant drops from killing goblins)

I beg to anyone who is reading this… DO NOT PLAY THIS SERVER! He is just after the money.

Here is trees video review from version 1. Trust me guys… Version 2 is not better!

If you are going to play, atleast wait til he comes out with Wrathscape V150, he does very little to each version he comes out with. So it might be fun by version 150.

P.S (To Beale) 2 of your beta testers told me while you were afk that they were quitting ( because you lied to them about there accounts or something?) They told me to let you know they were done.

[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9mslb84T20A[/youtube]

Read full topic

item.title: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more
item.dc:creator: @777slots2 777slots2
item.description:
@777slots2 wrote:

[quote=“paulvereline, post:18, topic:550504”]Honestly man you are no help at all to any server and for you to be calling your self a server helping is out of proportion because you are nothing but a trash talking douche bag. And to call mine and Beales server a disappointment is pretty crazy because you are like the only person who thinks that and you are a douche bag so it kind of matches up well so maybe instead of sitting your lazy ass on moparscape all day talking shit why dont you actually try and help servers and give them ideas instead of saying there a “disappointment” because there are a lot of new coders out there like my self trying to learn and are not perfect at making servers. Our server is nothing but a work in process and is still fairly new so why dont you back up and stalk a different server. Well actually you might as well quit the moparscape community because no ones here likes you at all and does not understand how you are a moparscape server helper. You are the moparscape douche bag.

  • Loving re guards from Paul and Beale. WrathScapeV2 ftw ![/quote]
    This is exactly the kind of cancerous people that infected the rsps community and now we’ve ended up with this big piece of shit we got today. I used to log into mopar and see atleast 3 servers worth logging into, because people actually put time and effort into their creations. Sk8r let you off easy, and provided intelligent constructive criticism. What he really should of told you is that your “server” is a complete piece of shit, and a waste of time for you and everyone that would join it. It just makes me think, seriously like what the fück do you people even think anymore while posting this garbage…

Read full topic

item.title: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:19, topic:550504”][quote author=paulvereline link=topic=669414.msg4477660#msg4477660 date=1427150424]
Honestly man you are no help at all to any server and for you to be calling your self a server helping is out of proportion because you are nothing but a trash talking douche bag. And to call mine and Beales server a disappointment is pretty crazy because you are like the only person who thinks that and you are a douche bag so it kind of matches up well so maybe instead of sitting your lazy ass on moparscape all day talking shit why dont you actually try and help servers and give them ideas instead of saying there a “disappointment” because there are a lot of new coders out there like my self trying to learn and are not perfect at making servers. Our server is nothing but a work in process and is still fairly new so why dont you back up and stalk a different server. Well actually you might as well quit the moparscape community because no ones here likes you at all and does not understand how you are a moparscape server helper. You are the moparscape douche bag.

  • Loving re guards from Paul and Beale. WrathScapeV2 ftw !
    [/quote]
    You see, that’s the exact reason why I don’t help you.

Why should I even think to help a person that’s going to act like that? Explain that to me.
Exactly. You can’t.
[hr]
Yes, I’m a server helper. That badge really has no meaning outside of the “Server Help” section. Hence it’s name.

And, I’d like to point out that I’ve helped plenty of people in the Server Help section (A lot more than you have, too). Again, which is why I got the badge.

I’m allowed to be a human being, and talk freely. There is no rules or stipulations that came with the badge (And if there were, I sure as hell wasn’t informed).
[hr]

You posted an advertisement on the website, I gave an honest reply. It’s your choice to do whatever with it. However, how you responded shows that you won’t be a very fit owner. And I’m glad I stopped playing.[/quote]

Sk8r has helped a ton of people, doesn’t mean he has to; the badge doesn’t obligate him to automatically help everyone, especially if they’re complete morons. He gave you constructive criticism and you’re acting like a little shit (scary to imagine how that reflects upon you as a server owner.) Nice review, btw. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,669619.0/topicseen.html Hopefully you take some notes from that video and strive for improvement, but I doubt it.

Read full topic

item.source: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more

item.title: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Played the server for the first time… It’s 100% disappointment.

  1. The first image on your homepage is a donator shop. Obviously you guys really, really want donations.
    You shouldn’t even be promoting that. Promote donations as a whole, not just 1 (EXTREMELY UNFAIR) feature.

  2. The client has an error when downloading the cache. It fails to check some url, and then downloads from another.

  3. There is no “challenge” in the server as everything is provided in shops. Dragon? Yep. Frost dragon bones? Yep. Slayer charms? Yep. Supplies needed to get 99 in skills? Yep.

  4. Fading hitmarks have black boxes around them.

  5. Your combat is terrible. If I hit npcs right, they don’t retaliate.

  6. NPCs can walk through walls.

  7. Where is the economy? There needs to be ways to make money other than just skilling.

  8. Server is beyond laggy.

  9. There’s sooooooooo many bugs.

Read full topic

item.title: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more
item.dc:creator: @paulvereline paulvereline
item.description:
@paulvereline wrote:

Lmao, the commands are fixed, we are adding uid and it messed up the commands a little bit, was an easy fix, we are leveling out all prices and changing stuff around, we all know the server isnt perfect. its a work in progress like any other server. The whole staff thing is situated as of now and we are proceeding to add tons of stuff to make this server even better. sorry for any inconvenience as far as everything goes but thank you for the feedback. expect to see you playing soon.
-Paul

Read full topic
item.source: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more

item.title: WrathScapeV2 | Bosses | Pvm | Eco | Pvp | Growing community | Dicing | And more
item.dc:creator: @snacksallday snacksallday
item.description:
@snacksallday wrote:

Server review:

Server itself is ok, eco is a bit wacky. Its super easy to get gold, which makes the economy virtually nonexistent. Multiple bugs here and there. My account is permanently muted and they can’t figure out how to undo it. Server accounts were all reset a week or two after I joined due to a staff member abusing power. Everyone else was punished because of it and unfortunately a handful of players quit. My only complaint is the way things are done here. Only staff member that has a decent idea on how to run things is the guy posting this thread, Paul. I feel the staff is a bit to tense with bans, mutes, and jail. They take offense to many things here, which is silly. That’s their choice. Server could be good if the owners took time to decide who should be on staff, instead of resetting and making brand new players a part of the staff. I may not know the whole story, but this is my experience.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You need to finish the custom game frame, or not have it at all.
It looks tacky as fuck to have everything changed, except bits.
The enabled chat type sprite, the report button, everything minimap related, the selected sidebar icon, and scrollbars all need to be redone to fit the gameframe.
